sqlQuery.name: AssembliesByEstAccession
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aa.source_id, aa.project_id FROM apidb.EstAttributes ea, apidb.AssemblyAttributes aa WHERE LOWER(ea.source_id) LIKE LOWER(REPLACE(REPLACE($$est_id$$,' ',''), '*', '%')) AND ea.assembly_source_id = aa.source_id AND aa.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@'

sqlQuery.name: AssembliesByLibrary
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aa.source_id, aa.project_id, count(*) as est_library_count FROM apidb.EstAttributes ea, apidb.AssemblyAttributes aa WHERE aa.source_id = ea.assembly_source_id AND ea.library_id in ($$libraryId$$) AND ea.assembly_est_count >= $$min_ests_in_assembly$$ AND aa.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' GROUP BY aa.source_id, aa.project_id HAVING count(*) >= $$min_lib_ests_in_assembly$$
